title: Congming De Shunliu Zhi Teshu Renwu
title_japanese: 聪明的顺溜之特殊任务
synopsis: The play tells about the five-member special combat team of Shunliu, Shangyu, and Gaochao, and the five-member youth team headed by Jingan received an order: complete a special task. After the ten people arrived at the base, they were told that the scientific research department had developed a large-scale experiential simulation VR national defense education system. They sat on the VR seats and returned to the important historical moment to participate in it, and experienced the historical events of that moment from the perspective of modern people. After reviewing the military history, the ten people realized "Why the soldiers fight", and the quiet five-member youth team understood the mission of being a teenager! (translated from iqiyi)
